title: Covid-19 Vaccine Rollout Carries Lessons for Pharma Supply Chains, Says Pfizer Executive
author: Liz Young
description: A supply-chain leader at the drugmaker says companies will map out manufacturing and distribution in advance to get lifesaving products to the public.
